title: Cannabis Industry Cannot Be Denied
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Cannabis stocks have been soaring this week - obliterating short sellers and giving hope to cannabis investors after a tough year. Julia Jacobson, CEO of Aster Farms, talks to us about how retail taught her about understanding volatility and the importance of holding prices through a recession. We also cover how COVID affects supply chains, building a sustainable brand, the role of smaller farms in the ecosystem and why venture funding may be on hold until Q4 or later. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
